species.name: klink
descriptions: Interlocking two bodies and spinning around generates the energy they need to live.
It’s suspected that Klink were the inspiration behind ancient people’s invention of the first gears.
The two minigears that compose this Pokémon are closer than twins. They mesh well only with each other.
Two bodies comprise a fixed pair. They spin around each other to generate energy.

abilities.name: plus
abilities.effect: Increases Special Attack to 1.5× when a friendly Pokémon has plus or minus.

abilities.name: minus
abilities.effect: Increases Special Attack to 1.5× when a friendly Pokémon has plus or minus.

abilities.name: clear-body
abilities.effect: Prevents stats from being lowered by other Pokémon.
